1544890.name: Ship Simulator Realistic
1544890.description:
Ship Simulator Realistic is a game developed with love and passion for ships and navigation. Pilot 14 ships predefined ships or add your using modding support. The game features many realistic features , you can play in a free roam aspect or Multiplayer with your friends. The game has a variety of sceneries including Greece(WIP) , part of Iceland , more islands and other sceneries will be added as the game updates. You can explore 8 main Greek islands , Narrow Iceland passages and practice your navy skills at the difficult and demanding maneuvering procedures , Singleplayer or Multiplayer mode. Additionally , in the game there is realistic sounds gathered from real ships like engines, exhaust sounds , horns and many other. Dynamic sea and the weather also provides an experience closest to the reality that provides enhanced atmospheric visuals and sounds.

Modding support is now live and you add your own creation to the game , navigate them and share them with your friends!!!

Features

  • Modding Support , you can add your own ships to the game !!!

  • Anchor Drop System
    Drop the anchors to help you at the docking procedures.

  • Sinking

  • Multiplayer
    Play with your friends online with up to 6 players in the same room

  • Mooring System
    Moor to up to 12 positions to the dock and secure your ship to the dock but be careful the line can snap.

  • Realistic Sounds
    Listen to recorded sounds from real ships.

  • Realistic Handling
    Experience realistic and challenging docking procedures.

  • Dynamic Ocean System
    Experience a next gen ocean system with dynamic waves produced by the ship , realistic foam , flow and atmospheric view.

  • Realistic Day Night Cycle

  • Dry dock
    Enter your ship to the drydock and lift it up from the sea and dock it .

  • Volumetric Lighting

  • Planar Reflections

  • Compass

  • Ship info - fuel consumption to ships with unique consumption to each ship and visuals - refueling at ports - engine rpm visuals

  • Procedural Wakes , Throttle and Thrusters
